comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Probably Sauret (Henri-Sébastien), né le 14 juillet 1853, à Rennes. See pages14-18.mesdiscussions.net/pages1418/qui-cherche-quoi/...

comment.author: 36645048@N00
comment._content:
Array of orders L to R
Commander 1st Class order of the Sword - Sweden 
Commander order of the Crown - Thailand
Commander order of St Olaf - Norway
Commander order of the Crown - Italy
Medal bar
Officer of the Legion of Honour - France
Officer of the order of Arts and Letters - France
Knight of the order of Agricultural Merit - France
2 medals
Officer of the Order of Nichan El-Anouar - French Somaliland
Officer of the order the the Rising Sun - Japan
3rd Class of the order of Military Merit - Spain (star on his left breast)
